title: Häufige Fragen zu Preisen & Paketen

body:

"]}),"

"]}),"

"]}),"

title: Frequently Asked Questions on Pricing & Packages
description: Transparent pricing for AI solutions and accessible websites. No hidden costs.
body:
const{Fragment:n,jsx:e,jsxs:r}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(i){const t={a:"a",h1:"h1",h2:"h2",li:"li",p:"p",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...i.components};return r(n,{children:[e(t.h1,{id:"frequently-asked-questions-on-pricing--packages",children:e(t.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#frequently-asked-questions-on-pricing--packages",children:"Frequently Asked Questions on Pricing & Packages"})}),"

",r(t.p,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Fixed Price"})," for defined scope (e.g., 5 service pages, WCAG audit)
",e(t.strong,{children:"Time & Material"})," for exploratory projects
",e(t.strong,{children:"Monthly Subscription"})," for maintenance & support"]}),"
",e(t.h2,{id:"what-does-an-ai-chatbot-cost",children:e(t.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#what-does-an-ai-chatbot-cost",children:"What does an AI Chatbot cost?"})}),"

",r(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Starter"}),": €290/month (up to 1,000 conversations)"]}),"

"]}),"

",r(t.ul,{children:["
",r(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Audit + recommendations"}),": from €1,200"]}),"

"]}),"

",r(t.ul,{children:["
",r(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Annual payment"}),": 10% discount"]}),"

",r(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Multiple services"}),": individual"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h2,{id:"are-maintenance-contracts-mandatory",children:e(t.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#are-maintenance-contracts-mandatory",children:"Are maintenance contracts mandatory?"})}),"
",e(t.p,{children:"No. Recommended for production systems from €150/month."}),"
",e(t.p,{children:e(t.a,{href:"#contact",children:"Request Quote"})})]})}return{default:function(n={}){const{wrapper:r}=n.components||{};return r?e(r,{...n,children:e(_createMdxContent,{...n})}):_createMdxContent(n)}};
